statements: SELECT * FROM regulatory_audit_documentation;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, auditor_name, inspection_type, inspection_result FROM regulatory_audit_documentation;
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name, inspection_type, inspection_result, audit_date FROM regulatory_audit_documentation;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audit_documentation ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT auditor_name, audit_id, inspection_type, inspection_result, audit_date FROM regulatory_audit_documentation WHERE auditor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audit_documentation WHERE audit_id = 100;
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name FROM regulatory_audit_documentation WHERE inspection_result LIKE '%pass%';
SELECT audit_date, inspection_type FROM regulatory_audit_documentation ORDER BY audit_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audit_documentation WHERE auditor_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY audit_id ASC;
SELECT audit_id, inspection_type, inspection_result FROM regulatory_audit_documentation WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE audit_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT audit_type, audit_date FROM audits WHERE audit_result = 'Passed' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date, inspection_result FROM inspections WHERE inspection_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE audit_date > '2022-01-01' AND audit_type = 'Internal';
SELECT inspected_entity FROM inspections WHERE inspection_result LIKE '%issue%' ORDER BY inspection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE audit_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT audit_type, auditor_name FROM audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE inspector_name = 'Alice Smith' AND inspection_result LIKE '%approved%';
SELECT inspection_date, inspected_entity FROM inspections WHERE inspected_entity IN ('Office Building', 'Warehouse') ORDER BY inspection_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audits;
SELECT * FROM audits
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name FROM audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_result FROM inspections WHERE inspection_result='Pass'
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM documents WHERE document_type='Report'
SELECT * FROM audits JOIN inspections ON audits.id = inspections.id
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE audit_result = 'Pass';
SELECT id, audit_date, auditor_name FROM audits WHERE audit_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM documents WHERE LENGTH(document_description) > 100;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_result FROM inspections WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM documents ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM audit_records;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, auditor_name FROM audit_records WHERE audit_type = 'Internal';
SELECT inspection_id, inspector_name, inspection_date FROM inspection_records ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT finding_id, finding_description, action_taken FROM audit_findings WHERE audit_id = 1;
SELECT finding_id, inspection_id, action_taken FROM inspection_findings WHERE finding_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM audit_records ORDER BY audit_date DESC, audit_id ASC
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name FROM audit_records WHERE audit_type = 'Internal Audit'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inspection_records
SELECT MAX(inspection_date) AS latest_inspection_date FROM inspection_records
SELECT * FROM audit_findings JOIN audit_records ON audit_findings.audit_id = audit_records.audit_id
SELECT * FROM audits;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, auditor_name FROM audits WHERE audit_result = 'Pass';
SELECT entity_name, location FROM entities WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT doc_name, doc_type FROM inspection_docs ORDER BY doc_type DESC;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date FROM inspections WHERE inspection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE audit_id = 1;
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name, audit_result FROM audits WHERE audit_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT entity_name, location FROM entities WHERE entity_id = 5;
SELECT doc_name, doc_type FROM inspection_docs WHERE inspection_id = 3;
SELECT inspection_date, inspector_name, inspection_result FROM inspections WHERE inspection_id = 2;
